skills.name: Active
skills.description:
[SP: 0][CD: 25s] Thrust ATK: Deal 50% ATK of Physical DMG.
Throw ATK: Deal 90% ATK + 1000% ATK of Physical DMG.
Counterstrike Throw: Deal 20% + 400% ATK of Physical DMG. Counterstrike Throw does not trigger weapon skill cooldown.

skills.name: Passive 1
skills.description:
When equipped by Palatinus Equinox,
Knight Form: weapon used as lance.
Guardian Form: weapon used as gunlance. Tapping weapon active will fire the gunlance, reload after 3 rounds:
1st Sequence: Deals 300% ATK of Physical DMG.
2nd Sequence: Deals 300% ATK of Physical DMG.
3rd Sequence: Deals 300% ATK of Physical DMG.
Firing after special attack will fire a coordinated blast:
[4th Basic ATK coordinated blast]: Deals 400% ATK of Physical DMG.
[Palatinus Slash coordinated blast]: Deals 3 x 350% ATK of Physical DMG.

skills.name: Passive 2
skills.description: Crit Rate +10%. Weapon skill Total DMG +12%, Physical DMG +12%.
